verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְחִזְקִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H2396><s%> now Hezekiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> to all Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah וְגַֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אִגְּרוֹת֙ <S%H107><s%> letters כָּתַב֙ <S%H3789><s%> and wrote עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto אֶפְרַ֣יִם <S%H669><s%> also to Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> and Manasseh לָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> that they should come לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> to the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to keep פֶּ֔סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּוָּעַ֨ץ <S%H3289><s%> had taken counsel הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> For the king וְשָׂרָ֛יו <S%H8269><s%> and his princes וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַקָּהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> and all the congregation בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to keep הַפֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <S%H8145><s%> in the second

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> since לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָכְל֛וּ <S%H3201><s%> For they could לַעֲשֹׂת֖וֹ <S%H6213><s%> not keep בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> it at that time הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> because the priests לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor הִתְקַדְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H6942><s%> had not sanctified לְמַדַּ֔י <S%H1767><s%> sufficient וְהָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> neither had the people לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נֶאֶסְפ֥וּ <S%H622><s%> gathered themselves together לִֽירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem

וַיִּישַׁ֥ר <S%H3474><s%> was right הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> And the thing בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> the sight הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וּבְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַקָּהָֽל׃ <S%H6951><s%> and all the congregation

וַיַּֽעֲמִ֣ידוּ <S%H5975><s%> So they established דָבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> a decree לְהַעֲבִ֨יר <S%H5674><s%> to circulate ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> A proclamation בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> throughout all Israel מִבְּאֵֽר־ שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H884><s%> from Beersheba וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even דָּ֔ן <S%H1835><s%> even to Dan לָב֞וֹא <S%H935><s%> that they should come לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to keep פֶּ֛סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> in לָרֹ֛ב <S%H7230><s%> [it] of a long עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> for they had not done כַּכָּתֽוּב׃ <S%H3789><s%> [time in such sort] as it was written

וַיֵּלְכוּ֩ <S%H1980><s%> went הָרָצִ֨ים <S%H7323><s%> So the posts בָּֽאִגְּר֜וֹת <S%H107><s%> with the letters מִיַּ֧ד <S%H3027><s%> from הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְשָׂרָ֗יו <S%H8269><s%> and his princes בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> throughout all Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah וּכְמִצְוַ֥ת <S%H4687><s%> and according to the commandment הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Ye children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שׁ֚וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> turn again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> God אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> of Abraham יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel וְיָשֹׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> and he will return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַפְּלֵיטָ֔ה <S%H6413><s%> of you that are escaped הַנִּשְׁאֶ֣רֶת <S%H7604><s%> to the remnant לָכֶ֔ם מִכַּ֖ף <S%H3709><s%> out of the hand מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּֽהְי֗וּ <S%H1961><s%> not be like כַּאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> And be not ye like your fathers וְכַ֣אֲחֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> and like your brethren אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who מָעֲל֔וּ <S%H4603><s%> which trespassed בַּיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers וַיִּתְּנֵ֣ם <S%H5414><s%> [who] therefore gave them up לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H8047><s%> to desolation כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you רֹאִֽים׃ <S%H7200><s%> as ye see

עַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּקְשׁ֥וּ <S%H7185><s%> stiffen עָרְפְּכֶ֖ם <S%H6203><s%> your neck כַּאֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> as your fathers תְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> [were but] yield יָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> yourselves לַיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> and enter לְמִקְדָּשׁוֹ֙ <S%H4720><s%> into his sanctuary אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הִקְדִּ֣ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> which he hath sanctified לְעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וְעִבְדוּ֙ <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְיָשֹׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> may turn away מִכֶּ֖ם <S%H4480><s%> that חֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> that the fierceness אַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H639><s%> of his wrath

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בְשׁוּבְכֶ֞ם <S%H7725><s%> For if ye turn again עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֲחֵיכֶ֨ם <S%H251><s%> your brethren וּבְנֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H1121><s%> and your children לְרַחֲמִים֙ <S%H7356><s%> [shall find] compassion לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before שֽׁוֹבֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7617><s%> them that lead them captive וְלָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> so that they shall come again לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into this land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חַנּ֤וּן <S%H2587><s%> [is] gracious וְרַחוּם֙ <S%H7349><s%> and merciful יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and will not יָסִ֤יר <S%H5493><s%> and will not turn away פָּנִים֙ <S%H6440><s%> [his] face מִכֶּ֔ם <S%H4480><s%> at אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תָּשׁ֖וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> from you if ye return אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> about פ

וַיִּֽהְי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become הָרָצִ֜ים <S%H7323><s%> So the posts עֹבְרִ֨ים <S%H5674><s%> passed מֵעִ֧יר ׀ <S%H5892><s%> from city לָעִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> to city בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> through the country אֶפְרַ֥יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> and Manasseh וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far זְבֻל֑וּן <S%H2074><s%> even unto Zebulun וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מַשְׂחִיקִ֣ים <S%H7832><s%> but they laughed them to scorn עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and וּמַלְעִגִ֖ים <S%H3932><s%> and mocked בָּֽם׃

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Nevertheless אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <S%H582><s%> Nevertheless divers מֵאָשֵׁ֥ר <S%H836><s%> of Asher וּמְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> and Manasseh וּמִזְּבֻל֑וּן <S%H2074><s%> and of Zebulun נִֽכְנְע֔וּ <S%H3665><s%> humbled וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> themselves and came לִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> was also בִּיהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> Also in Judah הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> was to give לָהֶ֖ם לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> them one לַעֲשׂ֞וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do מִצְוַ֥ת <S%H4687><s%> the commandment הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king וְהַשָּׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> and of the princes בִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> by the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֵּֽאָסְפ֤וּ <S%H622><s%> And there assembled יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רָ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> much לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> the feast הַמַּצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> of unleavened bread בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <S%H8145><s%> in the second קָהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> congregation לָרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> great מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> a very

וַיָּקֻ֕מוּ <S%H6965><s%> And they arose וַיָּסִ֙ירוּ֙ <S%H5493><s%> and took away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמִּזְבְּח֔וֹת <S%H4196><s%> the altars אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> that [were] in Jerusalem וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַֽמְקַטְּרוֹת֙ <S%H6999><s%> and all the altars for incense הֵסִ֔ירוּ <S%H5493><s%> took they away וַיַּשְׁלִ֖יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> and cast לְנַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> [them] into the brook קִדְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H6939><s%> Kidron

וַיִּשְׁחֲט֣וּ <S%H7819><s%> Then they killed הַפֶּ֔סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בְּאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <S%H8145><s%> [day] of the second וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֤ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites נִכְלְמוּ֙ <S%H3637><s%> were ashamed וַיִּֽתְקַדְּשׁ֔וּ <S%H6942><s%> and sanctified וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <S%H935><s%> themselves and brought in עֹל֖וֹת <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offerings בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיַּֽעַמְד֤וּ <S%H5975><s%> And they stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at עָמְדָם֙ <S%H5977><s%> in their place כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֔ם <S%H4941><s%> after their manner כְּתוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> according to the law מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priests זֹרְקִ֣ים <S%H2236><s%> sprinkled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> [which they received] of the hand הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For רַבַּ֥ת <S%H7227><s%> For [there were] many בַּקָּהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> in the congregation אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not הִתְקַדָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H6942><s%> that were not sanctified וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <S%H3881><s%> therefore the Levites עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over שְׁחִיטַ֣ת <S%H7821><s%> had the charge of the killing הַפְּסָחִ֗ים <S%H6453><s%> of the passovers לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> everyone לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> one not טָה֔וֹר <S%H2889><s%> for every one [that was] not clean לְהַקְדִּ֖ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> to sanctify לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> [them] unto the LORD

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> yet מַרְבִּ֣ית <S%H4768><s%> For a multitude הָעָ֡ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people רַ֠בַּת <S%H7227><s%> [even] many מֵֽאֶפְרַ֨יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <S%H4519><s%> and Manasseh יִשָּׂשכָ֤ר <S%H3485><s%> Issachar וּזְבֻלוּן֙ <S%H2074><s%> and Zebulun לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> had not הִטֶּהָ֔רוּ <S%H2891><s%> cleansed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> yet אָכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> themselves yet did they eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בְּלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> otherwise כַכָּת֑וּב <S%H3789><s%> otherwise than it was written כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> yet הִתְפַּלֵּ֨ל <S%H6419><s%> prayed יְחִזְקִיָּ֤הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> for them saying יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD הַטּ֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> The good יְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> pardon בְּעַֽד׃ <S%H1157><s%> about

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone לְבָב֣וֹ <S%H3824><s%> his heart הֵכִ֔ין <S%H3559><s%> [That] prepareth לִדְר֛וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> to seek הָאֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> God יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבוֹתָ֑יו <S%H1><s%> of his fathers וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> according כְּטָהֳרַ֥ת <S%H2893><s%> though [he be] not [cleansed] according to the purification הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary ס
